subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Originally {{zh-l|*匘}}, an {{Han compound|匕|巛|囟|ls=ic|t2=hair|t3=head; fontanel|nocap=1}}. {{zh-l|*匕}} was later replaced with {{zh-l|*肉|flesh}}.

subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=nǎo,er=y
|c=nou5
|h=pfs=nó
|md=nō̤
|mn=xm,zz,tw:náu/qz:nó͘/ló
|mn_note=Xiamen, Zhangzhou, Taiwan: náu - vernacular; ló - literary
|mn-t=nao2/lo2
|mn-t_note=nao2 - literary; lo2 - vernacular
|w=3nau
|mc=1
|oc=1
|cat=n,v
}}
